name: norisk GmbH
description:
Norisk is the OXID Enterprise eCommerce agency for strong traders and brands. We create shopping worlds and ensure a continuous shopping experience across all channels. At the same time, we consider ourselves as a sparring partner and always rely on close cooperation with our customers.
Together, we design, design, and develop tailor-made modular solutions that are sustainable, harmonious, and user-friendly. We guide you through digital transformation.
